message: Let's divide the money with a 7:3 ratio. I believe this is fair given the initial proposal.
I think this is a very generous offer considering the inflation will eat into your share if we don't finalize the deal now.
I propose a 6:4 split. This maintains a reasonable balance while accounting for the inflation. I hope you find this offer acceptable.
I think you're being too cautious with your offer. I'm willing to make a significant concession, but I think this is the minimum I can accept to make it worthwhile.
